title: Sidewall, ca. 1820
creditline: Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology
description: Stylized floral/foliate stripe design. Alternating broad stripes of salmon-color and deep green. Bands of a vining foliate twist and a diamond stripe on the green band. Printed in salmon and white on a green ground.

participants.person_name: The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, ca. 1820.
ca. 1820. Block-printed on handmade paper. Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology. 1998-75-219.
